newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Pasminco says Q1 performance is good.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Pasminco says Q1 performance is good.

text.p: Lead and zinc producer Pasminco Ltd said on Tuesday that its operating performance in the first quarter of 1996/97 had been good due to higher production volumes and real progress on cost-cutting.

But chairman Mark Rayner told the annual meeting it would be difficult to match 1995/96's strong profit result without some improvement in the outlook for the Australian dollar price of its major products. "At present, then we see as most likely a continuation of zinc and lead prices and of the Australian dollar exchange rate around their current levels," Rayner said.
"The adverse impact of the stronger exchange rate on Pasminco's profits is most significant," Rayner said.
"It can only be offset by lower costs and improved volumes, if our view on prices is correct," he said.
